Operation 'policysimulator.projects.locations.orgPolicyViolationsPreviews.operations.get' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_context, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, poor_ai_interpretability. Original operation lacks a summary entirely and has a generic description that doesn't provide domain context. The description doesn't clarify that this is specifically for orgPolicyViolationsPreviews operations, doesn't explain what the operation returns in the Policy Simulator context, and doesn't help AI agents understand when to use this versus other operation polling methods. Improved version adds domain-specific context (organization policy violations preview), clarifies the return type (GoogleLongrunningOperation), explains the use case (monitoring preview generation), and provides better AI agent interpretability by connecting it to the specific resource type being previewed.

data.current_description: Gets the latest state of a long-running operation. Clients can use this method to poll the operation result at intervals as recommended by the API service.
data.summary_suggestion: Get organization policy violations preview operation status
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves the current state of a long-running organization policy violations preview operation. This operation is used to poll the status and results of an asynchronous orgPolicyViolationsPreviews operation. Returns a GoogleLongrunningOperation object containing the operation's current status, metadata, and results if the operation has completed. Use this method to monitor preview generation progress and retrieve final violation analysis results.
data.reasoning: Original operation lacks a summary entirely and has a generic description that doesn't provide domain context. The description doesn't clarify that this is specifically for orgPolicyViolationsPreviews operations, doesn't explain what the operation returns in the Policy Simulator context, and doesn't help AI agents understand when to use this versus other operation polling methods. Improved version adds domain-specific context (organization policy violations preview), clarifies the return type (GoogleLongrunningOperation), explains the use case (monitoring preview generation), and provides better AI agent interpretability by connecting it to the specific resource type being previewed.
